channel.title: Modules on After Dark
channel.description: Recent content in Modules on After Dark

item.title: Fractal Forest
item.content:encoded: BPG Image format Homepage: bellard.org/bpg/ Module Source: codeberg.org/vhs/fractal-forest Demo Visual comparison between BPG, JPEG, JP2K and WebP Lena 512x512 image, visual comparison with JPEG Wikipedia photos Images with alpha channel Test images using different color spaces and bit depth Test animations Installation Note: Module pre-installed via Quick Install with example in post archetype. Choose a module download source: www.npmjs.com/package/fractal-forest www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/fractal-forest codeberg.org/vhs/fractal-forest Extract module contents into site themes directory: ├── static └── themes ├── after-dark └── fractal-forest Specify module in site config: 6# Controls default theme and theme components 7theme = [ 8 &#34;fractal-forest&#34;, # sequence before &#34;after-dark&#34; 9 &#34;after-dark&#34; 10] See README.md to confirm you&rsquo;re using the minimum required version of After Dark; and module setup, configuration and usage instructions. If you need help you may Submit an Issue with your question.

item.title: Hall of Mirrors
item.content:encoded: PhotoSwipe Homepage: photoswipe.com Module Source: codeberg.org/vhs/hall-of-mirrors Demo Your browser doesn't support HTML5 video. Download video instead. Installation Choose a module download source: www.npmjs.com/package/hall-of-mirrors www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/hall-of-mirrors codeberg.org/vhs/hall-of-mirrors Extract module contents into site themes directory: ├── static └── themes ├── after-dark └── hall-of-mirrors Specify module in site config: 6# Controls default theme and theme components 7theme = [ 8 &#34;hall-of-mirrors&#34;, # sequence before &#34;after-dark&#34; 9 &#34;after-dark&#34; 10] See README.md to confirm you&rsquo;re using the minimum required version of After Dark; and module setup, configuration and usage instructions. If you need help you may Submit an Issue with your question.

item.title: Voyeur
item.content:encoded: Fathom Mirror: codeberg.org/vhs/mirrors/fathom Module Source: codeberg.org/vhs/voyeur Voyeur Analytics Dashboard. Please visit the Fathom Website for interactive product demo. Installation Choose module download source: www.npmjs.com/package/mod-voyeur www.jsdelivr.com/package/npm/mod-voyeur codeberg.org/vhs/voyeur Extract module contents into site themes directory: ├── static └── themes ├── after-dark └── voyeur Specify module in site config: 6# Controls default theme and theme components 7theme = [ 8 &#34;voyeur&#34;, # sequence before &#34;after-dark&#34; 9 &#34;after-dark&#34; 10] See README.md to confirm you&rsquo;re using the minimum required version of After Dark; and module setup, configuration and usage instructions. If you need help you may Submit an Issue with your question.
